text:
[Verse]
Running through the city
Heartbeat fast and bright
Chasing down that moment
Till the break of night

[Verse 2]
Feet hit the ground
Sky fades to pink
Don’t know where we're going
No time left to think

[Chorus]
Hands up high
Touch the sky
We’re alive
We won’t hide

[Verse 3]
Neon lights are calling
Music loud and clear
Feel the bass vibration
Whisper in your ear

[Bridge]
Lost in this rhythm
No shadows cast
Future’s just beginning
Forget the past

[Chorus]
Hands up high
Touch the sky
We’re alive
We won’t hide
title: Chasing the Sun
